20110121210846.000|20110121210848.000|TR0|the school, yet their kids are beating the

20110121210912.000|20110121210914.000|TR0|PERRY:  Well, what a parent can do when 
20110121210914.000|20110121210916.000|TR0|they can is they can create a structure at 
20110121210916.000|20110121210918.000|TR0|home that supports learning.  We can say

20110121210920.000|20110121210922.000|TR0|their home and time, which means what do 
20110121210922.000|20110121210924.000|TR0|you spend your resources doing?       If 
20110121210924.000|20110121210926.000|TR0|you spend more of your resources on play, 
20110121210926.000|20110121210928.000|TR0|then your child is going to value play.  
20110121210928.000|20110121210929.000|TR0|Likewise, if you spend more on education, 
20110121210929.000|20110121210931.000|TR0|they will value education.  However, from
